`GlobalExceptionHandler.java` - 全局异常处理器\\n  - `ValidationException.java` - 验证异常\\n  - `ConventionException.java` - 协议请求异常\\n- `src/main/java/com/convention/request/integration/` - 外部集成\\n  - `EtourClient.java` - ETOUR服务器客户端\\n  - `EtourConfig.java` - ETOUR配置\\n\\n### 配置文件\\n- `src/main/resources/application.properties` - 主配置文件\\n- `src/main/resources/application-dev.properties` - 开发环境配置\\n- `src/main/resources/application-prod.properties` - 生产环境配置\\n\\n### 测试文件\\n- `src/test/java/com/convention/request/` - 测试类目录\\n  - `ConventionControllerTest.java` - 控制器测试\\n  - `ConventionServiceTest.java` - 服务层测试\\n  - `IntegrationTest.java` - 集成测试\\n\\n### 文档和脚本\\n- `pom.xml` - Maven项目配置文件\\n- `README.md` - 项目说明文档\\n- `docker-compose.yml` - Docker编排文件\\n- `src/main/resources/schema.sql` - 数据库初始化脚本\\n\\n## 数据结构和接口\\n\\n```mermaid\\nclassDiagram\\n    %% 实体类\\n    class User {\\n        +Long id\\n        +String username\\n        +String password\\n        +String email\\n        +String restaurantName\\n        +UserRole role\\n        +LocalDateTime createdAt\\n        +LocalDateTime updatedAt\\n        +boolean isActive\\n        +User()\\n        +User(username, password, email, restaurantName)\\n        +getId() Long\\n        +getUsername() String\\n        +setUsername(username: String)\\n        +getRestaurantName() String\\n        +setRestaurantName(name: String)\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ConventionRequest {\\n        +Long id\\n        +String requestId\\n        +User user\\n        +ConventionForm formData\\n        +RequestStatus status\\n        +ValidationResult validationResult\\n        +LocalDateTime submittedAt\\n        +LocalDateTime confirmedAt\\n        +LocalDateTime sentToEtourAt\\n        +String etourResponse\\n        +boolean isCancelled\\n        +ConventionRequest()\\n        +ConventionRequest(user: User, formData: ConventionForm)\\n        +validate() ValidationResult\\n        +confirm() void\\n        +submitToEtour() String\\n        +cancel() void\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ConventionForm {\\n        +String restaurantName\\n        +String restaurantAddress\\n        +String restaurantContact\\n        +ConventionType conventionType\\n        +LocalDate startDate\\n        +LocalDate endDate\\n        +List<String> termsAndConditions\\n        +List<String> attachments\\n        +Map<String, Object> additionalFields\\n        +ConventionForm()\\n        +ConventionForm(restaurantName, address, contact, type)\\n        +addTerm(term: String) void\\n        +addAttachment(filePath: String) void\\n        +getField(fieldName: String) Object\\n        +setField(fieldName: String, value: Object) void\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationResult {\\n        +boolean isValid\\n        +List<ValidationError> errors\\n        +LocalDateTime validatedAt\\n        +String validatorName\\n        +ValidationResult()\\n        +ValidationResult(isValid: boolean, errors: List<ValidationError>)\\n        +addError(error: ValidationError) void\\n        +hasErrors() boolean\\n        +getErrorMessages() List<String>\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationError {\\n        +String fieldName\\n        +String errorCode\\n        +String message\\n        +ErrorSeverity severity\\n        +ValidationError()\\n        +ValidationError(fieldName: String, errorCode: String, message: String)\\n        +getFormattedMessage() String\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% DTO类\\n    class LoginRequest {\\n        +String username\\n        +String password\\n        +LoginRequest()\\n        +LoginRequest(username: String, password: String)\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ConventionRequestDTO {\\n        +String requestId\\n        +ConventionForm formData\\n        +RequestStatus status\\n        +LocalDateTime submittedAt\\n        +ConventionRequestDTO()\\n        +ConventionRequestDTO(request: ConventionRequest)\\n        +toEntity(user: User) ConventionRequest\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ApiResponse<T> {\\n        +boolean success\\n        +String message\\n        +T data\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n        +ApiResponse()\\n        +ApiResponse(success: boolean, message: String, data: T)\\n        +success(data: T) ApiResponse<T>\\n        +error(message: String) ApiResponse<Void>\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 服务接口\\n    class AuthService {\\n        <<interface>>\\n        +login(loginRequest: LoginRequest) String\\n        +logout(token: String) void\\n        +validateToken(token: String) boolean\\n        +getCurrentUser() User\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ConventionService {\\n        <<interface>>\\n        +createRequest(formData: ConventionForm) ConventionRequest\\n        +validateRequest(requestId: String) ValidationResult\\n        +confirmRequest(requestId: String) ConventionRequest\\n        +submitRequest(requestId: String) ConventionRequest\\n        +cancelRequest(requestId: String) ConventionRequest\\n        +getRequestHistory(userId: Long) List<ConventionRequest>\\n        +getRequestById(requestId: String) ConventionRequest\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationService {\\n        <<interface>>\\n        +validateForm(form: ConventionForm) ValidationResult\\n        +validateField(fieldName: String, value: Object) ValidationError\\n        +getValidationRules() Map<String, ValidationRule>\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 控制器类\\n    class AuthController {\\n        +AuthService authService\\n        +login(loginRequest: LoginRequest) ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<String>>\\n        +logout(token: String) ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<Void>>\\n        +getCurrentUser() ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<User>>\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ConventionController {\\n        +ConventionService conventionService\\n        +createConvention(formData: ConventionForm) ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<ConventionRequestDTO>>\\n        +validateConvention(requestId: String) ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<ValidationResult>>\\n        +confirmConvention(requestId: String) ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<ConventionRequestDTO>>\\n        +submitConvention(requestId: String) ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<ConventionRequestDTO>>\\n        +cancelConvention(requestId: String) ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<Void>>\\n        +getConventionHistory() ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<List<ConventionRequestDTO>>>\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 外部集成\\n    class EtourClient {\\n        <<interface>>\\n        +sendConventionRequest(request: ConventionRequest) String\\n        +getRequestStatus(requestId: String) String\\n        +cancelRequest(requestId: String) boolean\\n        +isAvailable() boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 枚举类型\\n    class UserRole {\\n        <<enumeration>>\\n        OPERATOR\\n        ADMIN\\n        AGENCY\\n    }\\n    \\n    class RequestStatus {\\n        <<enumeration>>\\n        DRAFT\\n        VALIDATING\\n        WAITING_CONFIRMATION\\n        CONFIRMED\\n        SUBMITTED\\n        SENT_TO_ETOUR\\n        COMPLETED\\n        CANCELLED\\n        ERRORED\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ConventionType {\\n        <<enumeration>>\\n        STANDARD\\n        PREMIUM\\n        CUSTOM\\n        TEMPORARY\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ErrorSeverity {\\n        <<enumeration>>\\n        WARNING\\n        ERROR\\n        CRITICAL\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 关系定义\\n    User \\"1\\" -- \\"*\\" ConventionRequest : submits\\n    ConventionRequest \\"1\\" -- \\"1\\" ConventionForm : contains\\n    ConventionRequest \\"1\\" -- \\"1\\" ValidationResult : has\\n    ConventionForm \\"1\\" -- \\"*\\" ValidationError : validated by\\n    ConventionController ..> ConventionService : uses\\n    ConventionService ..> ValidationService : uses\\n    ConventionService ..> EtourClient : uses\\n    AuthController ..> AuthService : uses\\n```\\n\\n## 程序调用流程\\n\\n```mermaid\\nsequenceDiagram\\n    participant U as User (Operator)\\n    participant FE as Frontend\\n    participant AC as AuthController\\n    participant AS as AuthService\\n    participant CC as ConventionController\\n    participant CS as ConventionService\\n    participant VS as ValidationService\\n    participant EC as EtourClient\\n    participant DB as Database\\n    participant EH as ExceptionHandler\\n    \\n    %% 1. 用户认证流程\\n    Note over U,AS: 入口条件：用户已成功认证\\n    U->>FE: 输入用户名密码\\n    FE->>AC: POST /api/auth/login\\n    AC->>AS: login(loginRequest)\\n    AS->>DB: 验证用户凭证\\n    DB-->>AS: 返回用户信息\\n    AS-->>AC: 生成JWT令牌\\n    AC-->>FE: 返回认证成功和令牌\\n    FE-->>U: 显示主界面\\n    \\n    %% 2. 显示表单流程\\n    U->>FE: 点击\\"新请求\\"\\n    FE->>CC: GET /api/convention/form-template\\n    CC-->>FE: 返回表单字段定义\\n    FE-->>U: 显示协议请求表单\\n    \\n    %% 3. 提交表单数据流程\\n    U->>FE: 填写表单并点击提交\\n    FE->>CC: POST /api/convention/create\\n    CC->>CS: createRequest(formData)\\n    CS->>VS: validateForm(formData)\\n    VS-->>CS: 返回验证结果\\n    \\n    alt 数据无效或不完整\\n        CS-->>CC: 抛出ValidationException\\n        CC->>EH: 处理验证异常\\n        EH-->>FE: 返回错误详情\\n        FE-->>U: 显示错误信息，激活Errored用例\\n    else 数据有效\\n        CS->>DB: 保存请求为DRAFT状态\\n        DB-->>CS: 返回保存的请求\\n        CS-->>CC: 返回ConventionRequest\\n        CC-->>FE: 返回创建成功的响应\\n        FE-->>U: 显示验证成功，请求确认\\n    end\\n    \\n    %% 4. 确认请求流程\\n    U->>FE: 点击确认按钮\\n    FE->>CC: POST /api/convention/{id}/confirm\\n    CC->>CS: confirmRequest(requestId)\\n    CS->>DB: 更新状态为CONFIRMED\\n    DB-->>CS: 返回更新后的请求\\n    CS-->>CC: 返回确认后的请求\\n    CC-->>FE: 返回确认成功响应\\n    FE-->>U: 显示确认成功，准备提交\\n    \\n    %% 5. 提交到ETOUR流程\\n    U->>FE: 点击提交按钮\\n    FE->>CC: POST /api/convention/{id}/submit\\n    CC->>CS: submitRequest(requestId)\\n    CS->>EC: sendConventionRequest(request)\\n    \\n    alt 连接中断\\n        EC-->>CS: 抛出ConnectionException\\n        CS->>DB: 更新状态为ERRORED\\n        DB-->>CS: 确认更新\\n        CS-->>CC: 抛出ConventionException\\n        CC->>EH: 处理异常\\n        EH-->>FE: 返回连接错误\\n        FE-->>U: 显示连接中断错误\\n    else 连接成功\\n        EC-->>CS: 返回ETOUR响应ID\\n        CS->>DB: 更新状态为SENT_TO_ETOUR\\n        DB-->>CS: 确认更新\\n        CS-->>CC: 返回提交成功的请求\\n        CC-->>FE: 返回提交成功响应\\n        FE-->>U: 显示提交成功通知\\n    end\\n    \\n    %% 6. 取消操作流程\\n    Note over U,CS: 退出条件：用户取消操作\\n    U->>FE: 点击取消按钮\\n    FE->>CC: POST /api/convention/{id}/cancel\\n    CC->>CS: cancelRequest(requestId)\\n    CS->>DB: 更新状态为CANCELLED\\n    DB-->>CS: 确认更新\\n    CS-->>CC: 返回取消结果\\n    CC-->>FE: 返回取消成功响应\\n    FE-->>U: 显示操作已取消\\n```\\n\\n## 不明确的事项\\n\\n基于PRD文档，以下方面需要进一步澄清：\\n\\n1. **ETOUR服务器接口规范**：需要明确ETOUR服务器的具体API端点、请求格式、响应格式、认证方式和错误码定义。\\n\\n2. **协议数据的具体字段**：需要明确协议表单的完整字段列表、数据类型、必填/选填规则、字段长度限制和格式要求。\\n\\n3. **错误处理的具体场景**：需要详细定义各种错误场景（如网络超时、服务器错误、数据格式错误等）的具体处理策略和用户反馈信息。\\n\\n4. **用户权限和角色管理**：需要明确不同角色（操作员、管理员、机构人员）的具体权限范围和操作限制。\\n\\n5. **数据备份和恢复策略**：需要明确数据备份频率、备份存储位置、恢复流程和灾难恢复计划。\\n\\n6. **性能指标的具体要求**：需要明确系统负载能力、并发用户数、响应时间SLA等具体性能指标。\\n\\n7. **合规性要求细节**：需要明确\n\n## json decode error\nExpecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0)\n\n## Output Format\n```json\n\n```\nDo not use escape 处理用户认证和授权\\n3. **数据持久化**: Spring Data JPA + PostgreSQL - 关系型数据库存储\\n4. **验证框架**: Hibernate Validator + 自定义验证器 - 数据验证\\n5. **API设计**: RESTful API - 前后端分离架构\\n6. **构建工具**: Maven - 项目依赖管理\\n7. **测试框架**: 实现核心业务逻辑\\n3. **数据访问层 (Data Access Layer)**: 数据库操作和持久化\\n4. **外部集成层 (Integration Layer)**: 与ETOUR服务器通信\\n\\n### 关键设计决策\\n1. **认证机制**: 使用JWT令牌进行无状态认证，支持会话管理\\n2. **数据验证**: 多级验证策略（前端轻量验证 + 后端完整验证）\\n3. **错误处理**: 统一异常处理机制，返回标准化的错误响应\\n4. **事务管理**: 使用Spring声明式事务管理，确保数据一致性\\n5. **异步处理**: 对ETOUR服务器调用采用异步机制，提高响应速度\\n\\n## 文件列表\\n\\n### 核心Java类文件\\n- 处理用户认证和授权\n3. **数据持久化**: Spring Data JPA + PostgreSQL - 关系型数据库存储\n4. **验证框架**: Hibernate Validator + 自定义验证器 - 数据验证\n5. **API设计**: RESTful API - 前后端分离架构\n6. **构建工具**: Maven - 项目依赖管理\n7. **测试框架**: JUnit 5 + Mockito - 单元测试和集成测试\n8. **文档生成**: SpringDoc OpenAPI - API文档自动生成\n\n### 架构模式\n采用**分层架构**（MVC变体），包含以下层次：\n1. **表示层 (Presentation Layer)**: 处理HTTP请求和响应\n2. **业务逻辑层 (Service Layer)**: 实现核心业务逻辑\n3. **数据访问层 (Data Access Layer)**: 数据库操作和持久化\n4. **外部集成层 (Integration Layer)**: 与ETOUR服务器通信\n\n### 关键设计决策\n1. **认证机制**: 使用JWT令牌进行无状态认证，支持会话管理\n2. **数据验证**: 多级验证策略（前端轻量验证 + 后端完整验证）\n3. **错误处理**: 统一异常处理机制，返回标准化的错误响应\n4. **事务管理**: 使用Spring声明式事务管理，确保数据一致性\n5. **异步处理**: 对ETOUR服务器调用采用异步机制，提高响应速度\n\n## 文件列表\n\n### 核心Java类文件\n- `src/main/java/com/convention/request/ConventionRequestApplication.java` `src/main/java/com/convention/request/service/` - 服务层\n  - `AuthService.java` - 认证服务\n  - `ConventionService.java` - 协议请求服务\n  - `ValidationService.java` - 数据验证服务\n- `src/main/java/com/convention/request/repository/` - 数据访问层\n  - `UserRepository.java` - 用户数据访问\n  - `ConventionRequestRepository.java` - 协议请求数据访问\n- `src/main/java/com/convention/request/model/` - 数据模型\n  - `User.java` - 用户实体\n  - `ConventionRequest.java` - 协议请求实体\n  - `ConventionForm.java` - 协议表单数据\n  - `ValidationResult.java` - 验证结果\n- `src/main/java/com/convention/request/dto/` - 数据传输对象\n  - 数据结构和接口\n\n```mermaid\nclassDiagram\n    %% 实体类\n    class User {\n        +Long id\n        +String username\n        +String password\n        +String email\n        +String restaurantName\n        +UserRole role\n        +LocalDateTime createdAt\n        +LocalDateTime updatedAt\n        +boolean isActive\n        +User()\n        +User(username, password, email, restaurantName)\n        +getId() Long\n        +getUsername() String\n        +setUsername(username: String)\n        +getRestaurantName() String\n        +setRestaurantName(name: String)\n    }\n    \n    class ConventionRequest {\n        +Long id\n        +String requestId\n        +User user\n        +ConventionForm formData\n        +RequestStatus status\n        +ValidationResult validationResult\n        +LocalDateTime submittedAt\n        +LocalDateTime confirmedAt\n        +LocalDateTime sentToEtourAt\n        +String etourResponse\n        +boolean isCancelled\n        +ConventionRequest()\n        +ConventionRequest(user: User, formData: ConventionForm)\n        +validate() ValidationResult\n        +confirm() void\n        +submitToEtour() String\n        +cancel() void\n    }\n    \n    class ConventionForm {\n        +String restaurantName\n        +String restaurantAddress\n        +String restaurantContact\n        +ConventionType conventionType\n        +LocalDate startDate\n        +LocalDate endDate\n        +List<String> termsAndConditions\n        +List<String> attachments\n        +Map<String, Object> additionalFields\n        +ConventionForm()\n        +ConventionForm(restaurantName, address, contact, type)\n        +addTerm(term: String) void\n        +addAttachment(filePath: String) void\n        +getField(fieldName: String) Object\n        +setField(fieldName: String, value: Object) void\n    }\n    \n    class ValidationResult {\n        +boolean isValid\n        +List<ValidationError> errors\n        +LocalDateTime validatedAt\n        +String validatorName\n        +ValidationResult()\n        +ValidationResult(isValid: boolean, errors: List<ValidationError>)\n        +addError(error: ValidationError) void\n        +hasErrors() boolean\n        +getErrorMessages() List<String>\n    }\n    \n    class ValidationError {\n        +String fieldName\n        +String errorCode\n        +String message\n        +ErrorSeverity severity\n        +ValidationError()\n        +ValidationError(fieldName: String, errorCode: String, message: String)\n        +getFormattedMessage() String\n    }\n    \n    %% DTO类\n    class LoginRequest {\n        +String username\n        +String password\n        +LoginRequest()\n        +LoginRequest(username: String, password: String)\n    }\n    \n    class ConventionRequestDTO {\n        +String requestId\n        +ConventionForm formData\n        +RequestStatus status\n        +LocalDateTime submittedAt\n        +ConventionRequestDTO()\n        +ConventionRequestDTO(request: ConventionRequest)\n        +toEntity(user: User) ConventionRequest\n    }\n    \n    class ApiResponse<T> {\n        +boolean success\n        +String message\n        +T data\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\n        +ApiResponse()\n        +ApiResponse(success: boolean, message: String, data: T)\n        +success(data: T) ApiResponse<T>\n        +error(message: String) ApiResponse<Void>\n    }\n    \n    %% 服务接口\n    class AuthService {\n        <<interface>>\n        +login(loginRequest: LoginRequest) String\n        +logout(token: String) void\n        +validateToken(token: String) boolean\n        +getCurrentUser() User\n    }\n    \n    class ConventionService {\n        <<interface>>\n        +createRequest(formData: ConventionForm) ConventionRequest\n        +validateRequest(requestId: String) ValidationResult\n        +confirmRequest(requestId: String) ConventionRequest\n        +submitRequest(requestId: String) ConventionRequest\n        +cancelRequest(requestId: String) ConventionRequest\n        +getRequestHistory(userId: Long) List<ConventionRequest>\n        +getRequestById(requestId: String) ConventionRequest\n    }\n    \n    class ValidationService {\n        <<interface>>\n        +validateForm(form: ConventionForm) ValidationResult\n        +validateField(fieldName: String, value: Object) ValidationError\n        +getValidationRules() Map<String, ValidationRule>\n    }\n    \n    %% 控制器类\n    class AuthController {\n        +AuthService authService\n        +login(loginRequest: LoginRequest) ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<String>>\n        +logout(token: String) ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<Void>>\n        +getCurrentUser() ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<User>>\n    }\n    \n    class ConventionController {\n        +ConventionService conventionService\n        +createConvention(formData: ConventionForm) ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<ConventionRequestDTO>>\n        +validateConvention(requestId: String) ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<ValidationResult>>\n        +confirmConvention(requestId: String) ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<ConventionRequestDTO>>\n        +submitConvention(requestId: String) ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<ConventionRequestDTO>>\n        +cancelConvention(requestId: String) ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<Void>>\n        +getConventionHistory() ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<List<ConventionRequestDTO>>>\n    }\n    \n    %% 外部集成\n    class EtourClient {\n        <<interface>>\n        +sendConventionRequest(request: ConventionRequest) String\n        +getRequestStatus(requestId: String) String\n        +cancelRequest(requestId: String) boolean\n        +isAvailable() boolean\n    }\n    \n    %% 枚举类型\n    class UserRole {\n        <<enumeration>>\n        OPERATOR\n        ADMIN\n        AGENCY\n    }\n    \n    class RequestStatus {\n        <<enumeration>>\n        DRAFT\n        VALIDATING\n        WAITING_CONFIRMATION\n        CONFIRMED\n        SUBMITTED\n        SENT_TO_ETOUR\n        COMPLETED\n        CANCELLED\n        ERRORED\n    }\n    \n    class ConventionType {\n        <<enumeration>>\n        STANDARD\n        PREMIUM\n        CUSTOM\n        TEMPORARY\n    }\n    \n    class ErrorSeverity {\n        <<enumeration>>\n        WARNING\n        ERROR\n        CRITICAL\n    }\n    \n    %% 关系定义\n    User \"1\" -- \"*\" ConventionRequest : submits\n    ConventionRequest \"1\" -- \"1\" ConventionForm : contains\n    ConventionRequest \"1\" -- \"1\" ValidationResult : has\n    ConventionForm \"1\" -- \"*\" ValidationError : validated by\n    ConventionController ..> ConventionService : uses\n    ConventionService ..> ValidationService : uses\n    ConventionService ..> EtourClient : uses\n    AuthController ..> AuthService : uses\n```\n\n## 程序调用流程\n\n```mermaid\nsequenceDiagram\n    participant U as User (Operator)\n    participant FE as Frontend\n    participant AC as AuthController\n    participant AS as AuthService\n    participant CC as ConventionController\n    participant CS as ConventionService\n    participant VS as ValidationService\n    participant EC as EtourClient\n    participant DB as Database\n    participant EH as ExceptionHandler\n    \n    %% 1. 用户认证流程\n    Note over U,AS: 入口条件：用户已成功认证\n    U->>FE: 输入用户名密码\n    FE->>AC: POST /api/auth/login\n    AC->>AS: login(loginRequest)\n    AS->>DB: 验证用户凭证\n    DB-->>AS: 返回用户信息\n    AS-->>AC: 生成JWT令牌\n    AC-->>FE: 返回认证成功和令牌\n    FE-->>U: 显示主界面\n    \n    %% 2. 显示表单流程\n    U->>FE: 点击\"新请求\"\n    FE->>CC: GET /api/convention/form-template\n    CC-->>FE: 返回表单字段定义\n    FE-->>U: 显示协议请求表单\n    \n    %% 3. 提交表单数据流程\n    U->>FE: 填写表单并点击提交\n    FE->>CC: POST /api/convention/create\n    CC->>CS: createRequest(formData)\n    CS->>VS: validateForm(formData)\n    VS-->>CS: 返回验证结果\n    \n    alt 数据无效或不完整\n        CS-->>CC: 抛出ValidationException\n        CC->>EH: 处理验证异常\n        EH-->>FE: 返回错误详情\n        FE-->>U: 显示错误信息，激活Errored用例\n    else 数据有效\n        CS->>DB: 保存请求为DRAFT状态\n        DB-->>CS: 返回保存的请求\n        CS-->>CC: 返回ConventionRequest\n        CC-->>FE: 返回创建成功的响应\n        FE-->>U: 显示验证成功，请求确认\n    end\n    \n    %% 4. 确认请求流程\n    U->>FE: 点击确认按钮\n    FE->>CC: POST /api/convention/{id}/confirm\n    CC->>CS: confirmRequest(requestId)\n    CS->>DB: 更新状态为CONFIRMED\n    DB-->>CS: 返回更新后的请求\n    CS-->>CC: 返回确认后的请求\n    CC-->>FE: 返回确认成功响应\n    FE-->>U: 显示确认成功，准备提交\n    \n    %% 5. 提交到ETOUR流程\n    U->>FE: 点击提交按钮\n    FE->>CC: POST /api/convention/{id}/submit\n    CC->>CS: submitRequest(requestId)\n    CS->>EC: sendConventionRequest(request)\n    \n    alt 连接中断\n        EC-->>CS: 抛出ConnectionException\n        CS->>DB: 更新状态为ERRORED\n        DB-->>CS: 确认更新\n        CS-->>CC: 抛出ConventionException\n        CC->>EH: 处理异常\n        EH-->>FE: 返回连接错误\n        FE-->>U: 显示连接中断错误\n    else 连接成功\n        EC-->>CS: 返回ETOUR响应ID\n        CS->>DB: 更新状态为SENT_TO_ETOUR\n        DB-->>CS: 确认更新\n        CS-->>CC: 返回提交成功的请求\n        CC-->>FE: 返回提交成功响应\n        FE-->>U: 显示提交成功通知\n    end\n    \n    %% 6. 取消操作流程\n    Note over U,CS: 退出条件：用户取消操作\n    U->>FE: 点击取消按钮\n    FE->>CC: POST /api/convention/{id}/cancel\n    CC->>CS: cancelRequest(requestId)\n    CS->>DB: 更新状态为CANCELLED\n    DB-->>CS: 确认更新\n    CS-->>CC: 返回取消结果\n    CC-->>FE: 返回取消成功响应\n    FE-->>U: 显示操作已取消\n```\n\n## 不明确的事项\n\n基于PRD文档，以下方面需要进一步澄清：\n\n1. **ETOUR服务器接口规范**：需要明确ETOUR服务器的具体API端点、请求格式、响应格式、认证方式和错误码定义。\n\n2. **协议数据的具体字段**：需要明确协议表单的完整字段列表、数据类型、必填/选填规则、字段长度限制和格式要求。\n\n3. **错误处理的具体场景**：需要详细定义各种错误场景（如网络超时、服务器错误、数据格式错误等）的具体处理策略和用户反馈信息。\n\n4. **用户权限和角色管理**：需要明确不同角色（操作员、管理员、机构人员）的具体权限范围和操作限制。\n\n5. **数据备份和恢复策略**：需要明确数据备份频率、备份存储位置、恢复流程和灾难恢复计划。\n\n6. **性能指标的具体要求**：需要明确系统负载能力、并发用户数、响应时间SLA等具体性能指标。\n\n7. **合规性要求细节**：需要明确
